pullrequest.title: Add collision_detector to dart physics config

content.raw:
I think we should update the migration guide. The following patch should do it; I'll add it in after this is merged if you don't have a chance:

~~~
diff -r c3b29c9e5637 Migration.md
--- a/Migration.md      Fri May 25 17:44:12 2018 +0000
+++ b/Migration.md      Thu Jun 14 00:54:25 2018 -0700
@@ -104,6 +104,14 @@
     + required: 0
     + [pull request 369](#!/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/369)
 
+1. **physics.sdf** `dart::collision_detector` element
+    + description: The collision detector for DART to use.
+      Can be dart, fcl, bullet or ode.
+    + type: string
+    + default: fcl
+    + required: 0
+    + [pull request 440](#!/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/440)
+
 1. **link.sdf** `enable_wind` element
     + description: If true, the link is affected by the wind
     + type: bool
~~~
content.html:
I think we should update the migration guide. The following patch should do it; I'll add it in after this is merged if you don't have a chance:

diff -r c3b29c9e5637 Migration.md
--- a/Migration.md      Fri May 25 17:44:12 2018 +0000
+++ b/Migration.md      Thu Jun 14 00:54:25 2018 -0700
@@ -104,6 +104,14 @@
     + required: 0
     + [pull request 369](#!/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/369)

+1. **physics.sdf** `dart::collision_detector` element
+    + description: The collision detector for DART to use.
+      Can be dart, fcl, bullet or ode.
+    + type: string
+    + default: fcl
+    + required: 0
+    + [pull request 440](#!/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/440)
+
 1. **link.sdf** `enable_wind` element
     + description: If true, the link is affected by the wind
     + type: bool
